title: [Social Science] COVID-19 and Spanish Flu (1918) spread faster among people of higher social status during the initial phase. People of higher social status interact with a more diverse set of persons than people of lower social status, which a new study suggests may lead to increased susceptibility to the virus.

[Biology] COVID-19 evokes cellular aging, causing cytokine storm and multi-organ failure. Removal of senescent cells in 194 human patients with senolytics reduces hospitalization and death in early trials
